data.title: Service was awful!
data.text: A restaurant is truly only as good as its service. This place was a total disappointment in that sense. Rolls were pretty average & a great value. Waitress was very rude when she became confused about our bill. Definitely won't be returning. The rolls are drenched in the traditional sauces even if it is not specified in the description. Be weary of that as their spicy mayo is obviously left out to sit at room temperature for too long--it was very sour tasting. Hadn't been there in a very long time & hadn't expected it to have made such a terrible decline.

data.title: Great Sushi
data.text: I ordered a California roll, and mixed rice. My husband ordered a teppanyaki mix. And my son had chicken nuggets and french fries. service was great, food was great, everything was great! I give this restaurant an A +++
